Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 67th/Rhodes
ShortDescription: EB 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via Rhodes, 68th, Cottage Grove, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/Rhodes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via Rhodes, 68th, Cottage Grove, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/Rhodes.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed at Southport
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing at Southport due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing at Southport due to fire department activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
